body:
A scenario where the `authTracker` in `HonoSaslAuthenticator#process` fails because of such a timeout:

> [vert.x-eventloop-thread-0] DEBUG o.e.h.s.auth.HonoSaslAuthenticator - authentication failed: Timed out after waiting 3000(ms) for a reply. address: __vertx.reply.29, repliedAddress: authentication.in

should be handled here as well.
(The 3000ms value comes from `EventBusAuthenticationService.AUTH_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MILLIS`, the exception from `io.vertx.core.eventbus.impl.HandlerRegistration`.)

issue.title: [#1013] Fix wrong exception being thrown on SASL handshake failure.
[#1015] Use error codes for failed AuthenticationService requests
[#1015] Move EventBusAuthenticationService class to top level
issue.body: In preparation for adding a unit test for that class.
